Graphic Designer

Company: Global Urban Strategies, ES

Location: San Salvador

Employment type: full-time

Availability: immediate

About Us:

Global is a dynamic marketing and communication agency that specializes in print and digital solutions for businesses and municipalities. We craft tailored strategies and content to help clients connect and thrive.

Job Description:

We are seeking a creative and talented Graphic Designer to join our team. The Graphic Designer will be responsible for creating visual concepts and designs for a variety of projects, ranging from print materials to digital assets. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their design skills and a deep understanding of design principles.

Responsibilities:

  • Create visually appealing and effective designs for a wide range of projects, including but not limited to brochures, posters, websites, social media graphics, and branding materials.
  • Develop and maintain a consistent brand identity through design elements.
  • Produce high-quality graphics, illustrations, and layouts.
  • Select and edit photos, graphics, and other design elements for use in various projects.
  • Ensure all designs are in line with the company's branding guidelines and design standards.
  • Use graphic design software and tools to create, edit, and finalize design projects.
  • Handle multiple design projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in graphic design or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  • Knowledge of graphic design, motion graphics, illustration, branding, and editorial.
  • Interested candidates should submit their resume and portfolio showcasing their work. In your portfolio, please highlight your most relevant and creative design projects.

Technical Skills:

  • Proficient in English with strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Skilled in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and other relevant software.
  • Exceptional organizational and multitasking capabilities.
  • Competent in using Adobe Creative, including, but not limited to, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign, After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Adobe Acrobat.
  • Proactive and detail-oriented with strong initiative.
  • Effective teamwork and collaboration skills.
  • Knowledge of typography, color theory, layout, and branding principles.
  • Time management skills and the ability to meet deadlines.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to submit a their resume and portfolio to jackie@global-urban.com

Application Deadline: Tuesday, October 31st, 2023

Please note that not submitting the required documents (resume and portfolio) may lead to disqualification.
